prompts: Create a fairy-type Pokemon that radiates positivity and has bright, colorful markings.
I want a cute Pokemon that can fly and has a playful personality, with accents of red and blue.
Generate a whimsical creature resembling a small flying fairy, featuring soft, rounded shapes and vibrant colors.
Make a Pokemon that embodies joy with a rounded body and delicate wings, showcasing the colors white and blue.
Imagine a charming Pokemon that dances in the air, with a unique blend of colors and fairy-like features.
Design a Pokemon that brings happiness, equipped with wing-like arms and colorful patterns on its body.
Show me a small Pokemon with a soft body shape and cheerful demeanor, adorned with playful color accents.
